PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-12492008-06-18,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActCanadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission Act
PrecisAppointment of LOUISE POIRIER of Gatineau, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective August 11, 2008.
